#include <iostream>

int main () {
  int n,m;
  std::cin >> n >> m;
  int max = 0;
  int br = 0;
  for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
    int min = 1000000001;
    for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {
      int t;
      std::cin >> t;
      if (t < min) min = t;
    }
    if (max < min) { max = min; }
  }
  std::cout << max << std::endl;
}
